docs.snippet: Chelsea old boy Gus Poyet will again look to throw a spanner in the works at his former club when Sunderland host the runaway Premier League leaders on Saturday....

headline.main: Poyet Hopes Sunderland Can Be Chelsea Party Poopers Again
headline.print_headline: Poyet Hopes Sunderland Can Be Chelsea Party Poopers Again

docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea old boy Gus Poyet will again look to throw a spanner in the works at his former club when Sunderland host the runaway Premier League leaders on Saturday.

docs.snippet: A Spanish soccer team opened a bank account Thursday to collect donations for an 85-year-old woman whose eviction last week from her Madrid apartment sparked an outcry, team officials said....

headline.main: Spain Soccer Team Starts Fund for Evicted Woman
headline.print_headline: Spain Soccer Team Starts Fund for Evicted Woman

docs.lead_paragraph: A Spanish soccer team opened a bank account Thursday to collect donations for an 85-year-old woman whose eviction last week from her Madrid apartment sparked an outcry, team officials said.

docs.snippet: U. N. peacekeepers who were detained for possessing Congolese military uniforms apparently bought them to wear while hunting back home, a spokesman for the force said Thursday....

headline.main: UN: Peacekeepers Had Military Uniforms for Own Use
headline.print_headline: UN: Peacekeepers Had Military Uniforms for Own Use

docs.lead_paragraph: U. N. peacekeepers who were detained for possessing Congolese military uniforms apparently bought them to wear while hunting back home, a spokesman for the force said Thursday.

docs.snippet: Students rise to their feet as a uniformed Venezuelan brigadier-general enters a large classroom at a Caracas military institute and proclaims: "Chavez lives!"...

docs.lead_paragraph: Students rise to their feet as a uniformed Venezuelan brigadier-general enters a large classroom at a Caracas military institute and proclaims: "Chavez lives!"

docs.snippet: Advocacy groups barely waited for President Barack Obama to finish speaking about sweeping changes to the U.S. immigration system to start warning about scams....

docs.snippet: Turkish police have arrested the alleged killer of a Serbian basketball fan, stabbed to death in Istanbul last week before the start of the Euroleague match between Galatasaray and Serbia's Red Star Belgrade, media reports said....

headline.main: Alleged Killer of Serbian Fan Arrested-Media
headline.print_headline: Alleged Killer of Serbian Fan Arrested-Media

docs.lead_paragraph: Turkish police have arrested the alleged killer of a Serbian basketball fan, stabbed to death in Istanbul last week before the start of the Euroleague match between Galatasaray and Serbia's Red Star Belgrade, media reports said.

docs.snippet: The World Health Organization (WHO) needs reform to prevent a recurrence of crises such as West Africa's Ebola outbreak, former Australian prime minister Kevin Rudd said on Thursday....

headline.main: Ebola Shows WHO Needs Revamp, Says U.N. Reformer Rudd
headline.print_headline: Ebola Shows WHO Needs Revamp, Says U.N. Reformer Rudd

docs.lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization (WHO) needs reform to prevent a recurrence of crises such as West Africa's Ebola outbreak, former Australian prime minister Kevin Rudd said on Thursday.

docs.snippet: Electric vehicles have been slow to sell, largely because of a lack of charginig stations but as Hayley Platt reports one German entrepreneur has come up with the bright idea of installing charging points in existing street lamp posts....

headline.main: Lamp post electric gives cars a boost
headline.sub: Lamp post electric gives cars a boost

docs.lead_paragraph: Electric vehicles have been slow to sell, largely because of a lack of charginig stations but as Hayley Platt reports one German entrepreneur has come up with the bright idea of installing charging points in existing street lamp posts.

docs.snippet: Spectators of all ages oohed and ahhed as giant inflated characters floated through the streets of Manhattan during the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade....

headline.main: Giant Balloons Draw Oohs, Ahhs at Macy's Parade
headline.print_headline: Giant Balloons Draw Oohs, Ahhs at Macy's Parade

docs.lead_paragraph: Spectators of all ages oohed and ahhed as giant inflated characters floated through the streets of Manhattan during the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade.

docs.snippet: The first balance sheet of Portugal's Novo Banco, the successor to Banco Espirito Santo following a state rescue in August, will show solvency ratios above the required threshold and no need for additional capital, its chief executive said....

headline.main: Novo Banco CEO Sees No New Capital Need, Deposits Recovering
headline.print_headline: Novo Banco CEO Sees No New Capital Need, Deposits Recovering

docs.lead_paragraph: The first balance sheet of Portugal's Novo Banco, the successor to Banco Espirito Santo following a state rescue in August, will show solvency ratios above the required threshold and no need for additional capital, its chief executive said.
